name: Top Universities Rankings
special_instructions: The 'mode' filter can be either 'basic' or 'visitDetail'. 'Basic' mode scrapes only a list of the ranked universities with basic information. 'VisitDetail' mode visits each university's detail page to collect detailed information.
The 'year' filter selects a year of the QS rankings. It can be any year from 2017 to 2022.
The 'country' filter allows you to choose a specific country or select 'All countries' to not filter universities.
The 'maxItems' option limits the number of universities you want to get in the final dataset. The maximum value is 100.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
